description.brief: Interactive marker to create trajectories on the PR2

package.description: An interactive marker to create and execute a trajectory on the PR2. It supports cartesian gripper movements using a planner or collision-free IK, pointing the head to the marker, creating a trajectory and publishing it. It resembles pr2_marker_control, but it is not as features rich. But it supports creating and publishing (via bagrecord) trajectories.
package.author: Lorenzo Riano lorenzo.riano@gmail.com
